# City Electrical Services (Midlands)

## Business Information
- **Business Name**: City Electrical Services (Midlands)
- **Owner**: Shakeel
- **Trade**: Emergency Electrician / Electrical Contractor
- **Phone**: 07875 603686
- **Address**: 86 Kingswood Rd, Birmingham B13 9AP
- **Service Area**: Birmingham and surrounding areas (Kings Heath, Moseley, Edgbaston, Harborne, Selly Oak, Solihull)
- **Google Rating**: 5.0 stars (73 reviews)
- **Emergency Service**: 24/7 availability
- **Years in Business**: 4+ years

## Services Offered
- Emergency Electrical Repairs (24/7)
- Electrical Installation & Rewiring
- Fuse Box & Consumer Unit Replacement
- Fault Finding & Diagnostics
- Lighting Installation
- Socket & Switch Installation
- Electrical Safety Inspections & Testing
- Commercial & Residential Electrical Work
- PAT Testing
- EV Charging Point Installation
- Power Outage Response
- Emergency Call Outs

## Qualifications & Certifications
- Fully Qualified Electrician
- Fully Insured
- 18th Edition Qualified
- Part P Certified

- 5.0 star Google rating with 73 reviews

- Competitive pricing
- Quality workmanship and attention to detail
- Personal service from Shakeel

- Clear communication and professional approach
